Overrides:
act in class Card

specialFunction

public void specialFunction(Pawn p,
                            SorryBoard b)
Tells a given SorryBoard b to move given Pawn p to the first tile in the track if the pawn was on a StartTile. Otherwise, the board will move the pawn 1 space.

Specified by:
specialFunction in interface SpecialCard
Parameters:
Pawn - manipulate given pawn.
SorryBoard - choose the board on which to manipulate pawn.
